scripts.typecheck: bun run --filter '@openassistant/core' typecheck && bun run --filter '@openassistant/gateway' typecheck && bun run --filter '@openassistant/discord-bot' typecheck
scripts.typecheck:tsc: tsc --noEmit --incremental false -p packages/core/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit --incremental false -p apps/gateway/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit --incremental false -p apps/discord-bot/tsconfig.json
scripts.clean: bun run --filter '@openassistant/core' clean && bun run --filter '@openassistant/gateway' clean && bun run --filter '@openassistant/discord-bot' clean
